migrationNotStarted.title: This Pool May be Migrated to V4
migrationNotStarted.text:
Nobody has started a pool migration from V3 to V4, but they may decide to do so soon. 

You can check on this page to see if the migration has started.

migrationStarted.title: Lock Your Pool Shares
migrationStarted.text:
**The migration of this pool from V3 to V4 is in progress** 

You can now lock your liquidity pool tokens in the smart contract to ensure you will receive tokens from the new V4 pool when it is created.

The migration requires 80% of liquidity providers to lock their shares in the migration contract.

poolSharesLocked.title: Your pool shares have been locked
poolSharesLocked.text:
You have successfully locked your pool shares in the migration smart contract.

The migration won't be completed until the deadline has been reached or the required 80% of pool shares are locked.

deadlineMetThresholdMet.title: V4 Migration Will be Completed Soon
deadlineMetThresholdMet.text:
**You can no longer lock pool shares** The deadline for locking pool shares has passed or the required threshold of 80% of pool shares were locked in the migration smart contract.

The migration of the pool from V3 to V4 will be completed soon.

migrationComplete.title: This pool has been migrated to V4
migrationComplete.text: The migration of this pool from V3 to V4 has been completed.
